snippet: A former police officer charged with murder in the death of an unarmed black motorist is suing a police association, saying the group failed to provide the legal representation he paid for under an insurance plan.
lead_paragraph: A former police officer charged with murder in the death of an unarmed black motorist is suing a police association, saying the group failed to provide the legal representation he paid for under an insurance plan.

headline.main: South Carolina: Ex-officer Charged With Murder of Walter Scott Sues Insurer
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: Ex-officer Charged With Murder of Scott Sues Insurer
